\frac{N!}{(N-k)!k!} (\frac{\lambda}{N} )^k (1 - \frac{\lambda}{N} )^{N} (1 - \frac{\lambda}{N} )^{-k}


\begin{aligned}
&\lim_{N \to +\infty} \frac{N!}{(N-k)!k!} (\frac{\lambda}{N} )^k (1 - \frac{\lambda}{N} )^{N} (1 - \frac{\lambda}{N} )^{-k} \\\\
&= \lim_{N \to +\infty} N^k \cdot \frac{1}{k!} \cdot (\frac{\lambda}{N} )^k \cdot e^{-\lambda} \cdot 1 \\\\
&= \lim_{N \to +\infty} \frac{1}{k!} \cdot (N\frac{\lambda}{N} )^k \cdot e^{-\lambda} \\\\
&= \frac{1}{k!} \cdot \lambda^k \cdot e^{-\lambda} \\\\
&= \frac{\lambda^k e^{-\lambda}}{k!} \\\\
\end{aligned}
